title: Ezreal should not get around 2k in free gold from Kleptomancy each game.
body:
He synergizes way, way to well with this rune. 

You guys really, really need to look at his Mystic Shot. It needs to cost more mana, or not trigger klepto. 

Pretty much done with him at this point - as a plat support main, i'll be banning him until a nerf comes. I'd rather deal with Vayne/Twitch/Draven/Jhin over this mess.
**
EDIT:**
For those saying it's impossible, it happened in a recent game of mine, the Ezreal did get fed, and the game was over 50 minutes in length, so I do concede that it's unlikely the average is that high, but I'd wager a guess the average is over 600 gold earned per game, and that's not even counting the items he could have sold. 

Me and the Ez chatted a bit post game, his total was over 1900 gold, and he had about 23 items procced. He could have sold them for much, much more gold. He agree'd that it was pretty dumb at the moment. At many moments of the game, his gold earned from Klepto was MORE than my support item. It's broken, and i'll be banning Ezreal until it changes. 

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2676335901/32246691?tab=overview

It's very plausible for OP to have gotten that 2k gold lead but by the time the game ran 50 minutes in that lead should've been nullified by everyone having items and Ezreal falling off.
